candidates.title: updating to LairServerInProc and holochain 0.0.162
candidates.body:
it's panicing when I do the dry-run based on this error: 
https://github.com/holochain/lair/issues/103

we'll see what that means

candidates.title: Holochain 0.0.149, HDK 0.0.142, HDI 0.0.14, lair 0.2.0
candidates.body:
biggest change is that this now deals with passphrases. 

A valid passphrase MUST be piped to `holochain-runner` in order to proceed

candidates.title: Bump to hdk 123
candidates.body: Added empty test/data folder to repo so that dry-run.sh can work.

candidates.title: bump to holochain 126 and use happ path instead of dna buffer
Added UID and bootstrap url parameters
enable re-use of keys in a keystore
candidates.body: you can now delete user data, but leave your keys... thus, we enable the potential to re-install a new version of an app without changing keys

repo.name: holochain-runner
repo.description: Gives a binary providing wrapped Holochain Conductor with Status Update events, and a good SIGTERM kill switch
